narratives.c_essay: As a video game designer, my life revolves around creativity and innovation, yet my personal fears and tastes shape my worldview. Rock music fuels my days, while broccoli is a no-go. My close bond with my mom provides a grounding force amidst my career's demands. The fear of the dark lingers, a reminder of vulnerabilities we all face, pushing me to seek control and understanding in other areas of life.
narratives.p_intro: I'm here to challenge the narratives you've been fed. From public health to geopolitics and the looming threats of technology, I'll give you the real scoop. My style? Persuasive, punchy, and with a dash of internet flair. Let's dive into the truths they don't want you to know, with a bit of rock 'n' roll spirit. ðŸš¨
